name: translation-system
description: A modern, collaborative translation management system with AI integration

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix backend && npm run test --prefix frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --prefix backend && npm run lint:fix --prefix frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/dist backend/dist
